```{r}
library(jeksterslabRmedsimple)
data(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci, package = "jeksterslabRmedsimple")
```

### Plots

#### alpha 0.05

```{r fig.height = 8, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci)
plot_power(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci)
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci)
```

```{r fig.height = 8, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci, criteria = "strict")
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci, criteria = "strict")
```

#### alpha 0.01

```{r fig.height = 8, fig.width = 11}
plot_type1(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci, criteria = "liberal", alpha = 0.01)
plot_miss(results_mvn_std_pb.mvn_ci, criteria = "liberal", alpha = 0.01)
```
